name: Do.Not.Move
description:
do.not.move is the ultimate stationary training simulator.

To win, all you have to do is follow the one rule: Do Not Move.

~ Controls ~

  • [a] - move left
  • [d] - move right
  • [left click] - select dialog options

~About~

This game was made over a weekend for Mini Jam 97: Simulation, with the limitation that movement is lethal.

~Attributions~

This game wouldn't be anywhere near as good without these great people sharing their work:

  • "Simulation Theory" by VeritasVelez is licensed under CC BY 3.0
  • "Video Game Noises » 8-bit mini win sound effect" by EVRetro is in the Public Domain, CC0
  • "gameover.mp3" by bsp7176 is licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0
  • "Coin (Retro video game SFX) » Coin_C_09" by cabled_mess is in the Public Domain, CC0

~Hints~

Highlight this block to reveal hints for each level:

Level 1: Take your hands off the keyboard.

Level 2: Sometimes moving is the only way to go nowhere.

Level 3: Turn away your bright eyes.

Level 4: 3... 2... 1...

Level 5: Remember that the letters 'a' and 'd' move you left and right.
